channel.title: Mid-cap stocks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Mid-cap stocks on FinanClub

item.title: MRVI
item.description: score:7 Chances: Maravai LifeSciences has reported strong gains in the mid-cap segment, fueled by confidence about an economic soft landing and a dovish flip by the Fed. Risks: Full year revenue has declined as the company adjusts to post-pandemic demand, indicating potential challenges in the current market environment.
